segment.source: How to Install the App-V 5.0 Client for Shared Content Store Mode
segment.target: How to Install the App-V 5.0 Client for Shared Content Store Mode

segment.source: How to Install the App-V 5.0 Client for Shared Content Store Mode
segment.target: How to Install the App-V 5.0 Client for Shared Content Store Mode

segment.source: How to Install the App-V 5.0 Client for Shared Content Store Mode
segment.target: How to Install the App-V 5.0 Client for Shared Content Store Mode

segment.source: Use the following procedure to install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.0 client so that it uses the App-V 5.0 Shared Content Store (SCS) mode.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.0 client so that it uses the App-V 5.0 Shared Content Store (SCS) mode.

segment.source: You should ensure that all required prerequisites are installed on the computer you plan to install to.
segment.target: You should ensure that all required prerequisites are installed on the computer you plan to install to.

segment.source: Use the following link for a App-V 5.0 Prerequisites.
segment.target: Use the following link for a App-V 5.0 Prerequisites.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Before performing this procedure if necessary uninstall any existing version of the App-V 5.0 client.
segment.target: Before performing this procedure if necessary uninstall any existing version of the App-V 5.0 client.

segment.source: For more information about SCS mode, see Shared Content Store in Microsoft App-V 5.0 – Behind the Scenes (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=316879).
segment.target: For more information about SCS mode, see Shared Content Store in Microsoft App-V 5.0 – Behind the Scenes (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=316879).

segment.source: Install and configure the App-V 5.0 client for SCS mode
segment.target: Install and configure the App-V 5.0 client for SCS mode

segment.source: Copy the App-V 5.0 client installation files to the computer on which it will be installed.
segment.target: Copy the App-V 5.0 client installation files to the computer on which it will be installed.

segment.source: Open a command line and from the directory where the installation files are saved type one of the following options depending on the version of the client you are installing:
segment.target: Open a command line and from the directory where the installation files are saved type one of the following options depending on the version of the client you are installing:

segment.source: To install the RDS version of the App-V 5.0 client type: appvclientsetuprds.exe /SHAREDCONTENTSTOREMODE=1 /q
segment.target: To install the RDS version of the App-V 5.0 client type: appvclientsetuprds.exe /SHAREDCONTENTSTOREMODE=1 /q

segment.source: To install the standard version of the App-V 5.0 client type: appvclientsetup.exe /SHAREDCONTENTSTOREMODE=1 /q
segment.target: To install the standard version of the App-V 5.0 client type: appvclientsetup.exe /SHAREDCONTENTSTOREMODE=1 /q

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: You must perform a silent installation or the installation will fail.
segment.target: You must perform a silent installation or the installation will fail.

segment.source: After you have completed the installation you can deploy packages to the computer running the client and all package contents will be streamed across the network.
segment.target: After you have completed the installation you can deploy packages to the computer running the client and all package contents will be streamed across the network.
